subtitle: chapter 2 the weight of freedom there is
only one will in the universe just as
there is only one mind the one mind is
the mind of God the one will is the will
of God the mind of individual man is an
individual or a differentiated
expression of the infinite mind and the
largeness of this human mind depends
upon how much of the one mind man may
decide to appropriate man has the
freedom to incorporate in his own
individual consciousness as much of the
infinite mind as he may desire and as
the mind of the infinite is limitless
the mind of man may continue to become
larger and larger without any end the
will of the individual mind is a partial
expression of the will of God just as
the force of growth that is in each
branch is a part of the same force that
is in the vine and the power of the
individual will depends upon how
perfectly the individual mind works in
harmony with the infinite mind there is
no limit to the power of the will of God
the divine will therefore when the human
will is as large a part of the divine
will as the individual mind can
appropriate and apply the human will
will necessarily become immensely strong
and since the individual mind can
appropriate a larger and larger measure
of the divine will there is no limit to
the power of will that can be developed
in the mind of man to develop the true
will the first essential is to realize
that there is but one will and that we
will with the one will just as we live
the one life and think with the one mind
though when our thinking living and
willing we do not as a rule do justice
to that part of the whole which it is
our privilege to use we think live and
will to much as isolated entities
instead it was a divine being eternally
United with supreme the second essential
is to realize that the divine will works
only for better things and greater
things the path of the Divine Will is
upward and onward forever and its power
is employed exclusively in building more
lofty mansions for the soul
therefore the will of God does not
produce sickness adversity or death on
the contrary the will of God eternally
wills to produce wholeness harmony
in life the yields of personal life are
not produced by divine will they are
produced by man's inability to properly
use that part of divine will that is
being expressed in his mind and his
inability comes because man does not
always apply his will and harmony with
divine will when man uses his will as
his own isolated power lies his mind
more and more from the source of the
power he is in consequence the power of
his will becomes weaker and he
necessarily fails to accomplish what he
has in his view he also fails apart from
the one ascending current of life he
gets out of harmony with the true order
of things and sickness trouble adversity
and want and variably follow the true
use of the will is to apply the will in
a full recognition of the oneness of the
human will with the Divine Will my will
is as much of the Divine Will as I am
using now and it is my privilege to use
as much of the Divine Will as ma desire
to constantly think of my will and the
Divine Will as the same Will is to place
my mind in such perfect harmony with
limitless power of divine will that I
can appropriate this power in larger and
larger measure and the more I
appropriate the stronger becomes the
power of will in me when the individual
mind is in such perfect harmony with a
supreme mind that the Divine Will can be
given free and full expression the will
of the individual mind becomes
invincible the secret therefore of
developing a powerful will is found here
and here alone the true will is never
domineering nor antagonistic neither
does it ever apply the force of
resistance if you are in tagging istic
or have a tendency to resist everything
that is not to your liking it is proof
conclusive that you are not in harmony
with Divine Will
you are misdirecting your power and are
forming obstacles and pitfalls for
yourself the Divine Will does not
attempt to overcome evils and obstacles
within Haigh mystic or domineering
forces the Divine Will does not fight
wrong its transforms wrong it works in
silence and serenity but goes so deeply
into the elements of things that it
undermines the very first cause of
adverse or detrimental conditions it
does not resist the surface but goes
calmly beneath the surface and
transforms those under currents from
which surface conditions proceed the
divine will by going into the deeper
life of all things transforms all things
into harmony with itself and can
transform all things because it's power
supreme therefore when we are in the
midst of adversity we should not rail

conditions that seemed to work against
us we have within us the power of divine
will and this will can change everything

is not the will of God to keep any
person and adversity it is the will of
God to set every person free and every
person will be set free when he places
his life completely in the hands of
divine will when the individual mind can

individual life has been placed in the
power divine will and that life will at

sickness trouble and want into the world
of freedom however we do not give up our

to divine will we do not become
automatons in the hands of some superior
power on the contrary
we open our minds to the power that
alone can produce individuality the
individuality we now possess has been

will that we have incorporated in our
own conscious existence and by opening

shall gain sufficient power to make our

is not to be used by the supreme but to

a son of the Most High when the

done
consciousness must fully recognize the

existence when the mine gives up to

it is simply giving up to the

God does not tell us what to do he has

then we must will to press on knowing
that we are using
we'll the supreme will of the Most High
because this is the only will in the

to the absolute direction of higher
power there is a slight dread in the

as long as things are reasonably well he
does not care to give up to some power
he knows nothing of and as a true
understanding of higher power cannot be
found among the many there are according
but few who can actually declare with
the whole heart thy will be done we
frequently pray for his will to guide us
nevertheless we inwardly expect to use
our own wills and mostly everything we
do but such prayers are not true to the
spirit and therefore they prevent the
soul from actually discerning the real
meaning of God's will and also prevent
the mind from becoming a perfect channel
for the expression of his will the
universe is orderly from Center to
circumference and everything is
established upon the firm foundation of
eternal right and universal good there
is a power that lives and moves
throughout this vast immensity and all
those things that have a permanent place
in the cosmos or that are instrumental
at any way in promoting the purpose of
life have their source in this one power
all the laws and forces in existence
spring originally from this power it is
therefore the center and source of all
that lives and moves and this power is
the will of God accordingly to do the
will of the Father is to enter into
harmony with the universal order and
promote the great eternal plan the laws
of life are all expressions of supreme
will God wills eternally the right and
the true and the activist willing
originates and perpetuates the sublime
plan of life that harmoniously thrills
the entire cosmos during endless
eternity God's will is constant and
changeless therefore all the laws and
principles in existent
remain ever the same as they are the
expressions of the one will all that we
see in the life of the universe is the

the perpetual returning to the one
source the true will and every soul is
an individualization of infinite will
and the true use of the individual will
means that doing of the will of God the

things but seeks eternally to give
itself to things and here lies the
secret and correctly using the human

perfect harmony with God's will when you
can say with the whole heart thy will be

but you are placing your own will and
the whole of your life and oneness with

therefore when you do the will of God
your own will becomes right and he
becomes infinitely stronger than it ever
was before when we act in perfect accord
of the laws of life on all the plains of
being we are doing the will of God
because what we call law in life is the

fully appreciates her grandeur and her

inspired by the loveliness of her
presence is doing the will of God in the

he who searches the deep things of God
and enters into that high state where

whoever can say with his whole heart thy

perfect harmony with all that is because
all is of God to do the will of God is
not only to place one's life in the

to all the world
the will of God seeks eternally to give
itself to things all things the will of
man to be in harmony with the will of
God must do the same however
insignificant a law may seem to be it is
God's working in the part of his
universe and as he is everywhere

good the incompleteness of human life to

enter in a perfect Accord with all the
laws in our sphere of existence we may
be holy right in some things while the
very opposite and other things we may be
scrupulous in regard to the right use of
some laws and at the same time
continually negligent in regard to
others there are many who take perfect
care of their bodies and comply most
rigidly with all known physical laws yet
they violate the laws of mind
nearly every hour of their existence
others are very careful so as to think
only the truth and do their best to
remain continually in the most beautiful
states of mind but while aiming to live
and mental ideals they are holy and
different to the welfare of the body not
infrequently we find people who live in
perfect accord with intellectual laws
but violate daily the moral laws also
too many who are than the reverse in
brief the majority do the will of God in
some realms while living entirely at
variance with his laws and other realms
and here we find the simple answer to
many perp Xing questions when some

is unjust or that fate
kind you have simply failed to do his
will in all things do not blame others

yourself simply proceed to readjust your

in all things then all ills shall
disappear and you shall not only regain

accord with all the laws of life
physically mentally and spiritually do
